data.text: @runo_public @eesgreene I deeply appreciate that, thank you! It is my pleasure to help where I can! ☺️
@sailorrooscout @eesgreene Thank YOU for doing this awesome of a job here for all of us! Your information is invaluable!
@runo_public @eesgreene Thank you so much for being so understanding! ☺️
@sailorrooscout @eesgreene No worries at all. You’ve got a lot of people messaging you, and you do it all for free. I’d have asked again if it was a pressing matter. ♥️
@eesgreene @runo_public Thank you! Sorry Runo I didn’t see your comment til not!

@runo_public @sailorrooscout If you scroll back in her timeline about two weeks, there is a study on the reduction in long Covid in vaccinated patients. As I recall it’s 80% less likely, which is pretty good.

@SciRules1 @EtherialBitch I believe currently 4th doses are only for those who are considered to be immunocompromised. This might help. I am not certain where you’re getting that number from? https://t.co/3zsDQSjEAT
@sailorrooscout You’re getting good at preemptively batting back the trolls! Law school next?
